1.title: USS Edison
1.plot: The TWC board the U.S.S. Edson, a haunted battleship that served in the Vietnam War. Their goal is to set free the spirits trapped aboard -- including a disturbed poltergeist. But the elusive entities seem to have other plans.

2.title: Old South Pittsburgh Hospital
2.plot: The TWC returns to the site of their first paranormal investigation, Old South Pittsburgh Hospital, where a menacing shadow figure roams the hospital's halls. Now with more experience, the TWC hopes to uncover the shadow figure's true identity.

3.title: Peoria State Hospital
3.plot: The TWC are the last people to explore the horrific Peoria State Hospital, where more than 10,000 people died. With mere days left until this house of horrors is demolished, the team must work fast to reach the spirits that still call it home.

4.title: Missouri State Penitentiary
4.plot: Back in Tennessee the boys investigate a legendarily brutal prison every southerner feared, Brushy Mountain State Penitentiary. As a huge electrical storm bears down on them, the team is taunted and attacked, while battling ghosts.

5.title: Castillo De San Marcos
5.plot: The TWC are in Florida at one of the most haunted forts in the country: Castillo de San Marcos, where they attempt to make contact with the disembodied head of a Seminole Indian Chief and a pair of doomed lovers caught in a vicious love triangle.

6.title: Pauly Jail
6.plot: The TWC investigates infamous Pauly Jail. Built in the 1800s, it has a history of racial prejudice, and unauthorized executions. The guys come to make contact with the victim of a brutal lynching, and a prisoner who was burned alive.

7.title: Preston Castle
7.plot: The TWC journey to Preston Castle, California's first boy's reformatory school, to find answers to two of its most mysterious deaths --the brutal murder of a beloved housekeeper and the tragic beating death of a teacher.

1.title: Old War Memorial
1.plot: This next adventure takes the team to Old War Memorial Hospital in Scottsville, Kentucky. Locals believe that a former doctor lost his mind and, after his death, his spirit returned to continue his rounds.

2.title: Kuhn Memorial Hospital
2.plot: TWC heads south to Vicksburg, Mississippi to investigate the massive Kuhn State Hospital. Due to the size of this asylum, the team will have to think outside the box in order to trap the spirits within.

3.title: Hayswood Infirmary
3.plot: The team heads to the Hayswood Infirmary in Maysville, KY. This asylum was a horrific home for veterans suffering from shell shock. It's also host to a disputed piece of paranormal evidence known as the Hayswood Ghost video.

4.title: St. Vincent's Mental Home
4.plot: This week, the team travels to Oklahoma City to investigate an evil asylum known as St. Vincent's Mental Home. A history of horror seems to have created a dark energy that is haunting these halls. Now, St. Vincent's sits abandoned waiting for TWC.

5.title: Old Ironton Hospital
5.plot: TWC goes to Ironton, Missouri to investigate an asylum with a dark history of violent patient treatment. Local legend tells of a nurse that was killed here and who still roams the halls.

6.title: Old Cannon Memorial
6.plot: TWC travels to North Carolina to explore Old Cannon Memorial. This asylum and general hospital is terrorizing the community with disturbing reports of the building being able to lure people inside and drive them insane.

1.title: U.S. Marine Hospital
1.plot: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers find themselves in their own backyards, Memphis, TN, for a once in a lifetime investigation of the haunted U.S. Marine Hospital. This hospital was rampant with death and maltreatment claiming the lives of thousands.

2.title: Sloss Furnace
2.plot: Known as the "Southern Gates of Hell" TWC is on the hunt at Sloss Furnaces in Alabama. While on the job this ghastly metal foundry claimed the lives of countless workers by either burning or gassing them to death.

3.title: Rolling Hills Asylum
3.plot: Tonight the Tennessee Wraith Chasers are on the hunt in one of the Northeast's deadliest locations, Rolling Hills Asylum. Tragedy and mistreatment transformed a place that was supposed to help the needy into a hell house of despair.

4.title: Mansfield Reformatory
4.plot: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers travel to the heart of Ohio to investigate the most haunted prison in America--Mansfield Reformatory. This prison housed the most violent criminals in the state; torture, assault and suicides were commonplace here.

5.title: St. Albans Sanatorium
5.plot: TWC investigate Albans Sanatorium, a former boys' school and experimental hospital. They try to make contact with the spirit of a murdered girl and rid the basement of a demonic entity.

6.title: Waverly Sanatorium
6.plot: Labeled, "The Most Haunted Hospital in the U.S." Waverly Hills Sanatorium enslaves the spirits of thousands of agonized TB patients who were experimented on and died here. The boys are geared up to trap the spirits of TB victims.

7.title: Moundsville Penitentiary
7.plot: Murder, torture, rape, and inhuman conditions caused thousands of deaths and endless suffering at Moundsville Penitentiary. The Tennessee Wraith Chasers hope to trap the feuding spirits of a white supremacist and the head of a biker gang.

8.title: Cannon Memorial Hospital
8.plot: Vengeance is in the air as TWC heads back to handle unfinished business at Cannon Memorial Hospital. New intel about a forsaken Native American spirit, new gear, and an explosive trap have the team set to unlock this bloody hospital's past.

9.title: Fenwick Plantation
9.plot: Haunted Fenwick Plantation is one of South Carolina's most paranormally active locations with a treacherous 300-year-old history. The boys are hunting for the spirits of pirates, spies, and a headless horseman said to still roam its grounds.

10.title: Pennhurst Asylum
10.plot: The TWC investigates one of the most tragically haunted locations in America, Pennhurst Asylum. With a history of child patient abuse this one is personal for the fellas. They're on the hunt to trap and free any tortured child spirits.

11.title: Hill View Manor
11.plot: Hill View Manor is known as one of the most haunted buildings in Western Pennsylvania. TWC are here to find and trap the spirits of two suicidal patients, and a gargoyle that lurks in its shadows.

12.title: Sibley Mill
12.plot: The TWC are the first team to investigate an old Confederate gunpowder and fabric factory, Sibley Mill. Some say to be the most haunted location in the South.

13.title: Fort Delaware
13.plot: Stranded on a river island our team is trapped and has 48-hours to investigate terrifying Fort Delaware, a former civil war POW camp that claimed the lives of 1 in 4 prisoners. The boys try to solve the ghostly feud of two civil war generals.

14.title: The Bissman Building
14.plot: In Mansfield, Ohio stands a family monument to tragedy and ghostly activity, The Bissman Building. The boys are put to the test when challenged to prove reports of a dark portal in the building, and uncover the truth about some brutal deaths.

imdb.plot outline: "GHOST ASYLUM", a fearless crew is on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions by any means possible, even if that requires luring themselves as the decoy. GHOST ASYLUM follows the most passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC), as they examine some of America's most frightening asylums, sanitariums and mental hospitals. Their goal isn't just to conjure spirits and collect evidence but they are on a mission to physically capture restless souls with their cutting-edge ghost traps and self-trained Tennessean wit.
imdb.title: Ghost Asylum
plot: "GHOST ASYLUM", a fearless crew is on a quest to hunt down chain-rattling ghosts and scary apparitions by any means possible, even if that requires luring themselves as the decoy. GHOST ASYLUM follows the most passionate paranormal team in America, the Tennessee Wraith Chasers (TWC), as they examine some of America's most frightening asylums, sanitariums and mental hospitals. Their goal isn't just to conjure spirits and collect evidence but they are on a mission to physically capture restless souls with their cutting-edge ghost traps and self-trained Tennessean wit.::Wolfgang
